DOC.brief_title: Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Treatment Negative Symptoms Schizophrenia Patients .
DOC.detailed_description: The principal objective trial investigate effect high frequency rTMS negative symptom schizophrenia .
DOC.criteria: The diagnosis schizophrenia accord DSMIV； 18～55 year old； schizophrenic illness duration longer one year ; The sum negative score range Positive negative symptom score ( PANSS ) must 20 point higher , least one item area negative symptom ( N1N7 ) must ≥ 4 point ( least moderate , clinically significant symptom ) , improvement negative symptomsum ( measure PANSS ) must 10 % low last two week rTMS stimulation . Have stable consistent drug treatment least two week prior rTMS treatment ; Able adhere treatment schedule ; IQ≥80 ; Dextromanual , normal vision hearing ; Signed informed consent rTMS contraindication : intracranial metal substance , heart pacemaker cochlear implant , intracranial pressure ; Acute risk suicide impulse； patient diagnose accord DSMIV substance abuse , development delay ; suffer serious physical disease accept treatment ; history epileptic seizure presence epileptic activity document basis EEG ; difficult maintain current drug treatment least 1 month ; undergo ECT MECT last 3 month ; current treatment anticonvulsant act drug anticonvulsant , benzodiazepine .
